adventure_overview: With their family or den, Tigers learn bike safety and go on a bike ride.  Bikes, training wheels, tricycles, and adaptive bikes are welcome. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.

requirements.text: Learn the ABC’s of bike gear (air, brakes, chain.)

activities.name: Talk With A Pro
activities.description: A guest speaker who is an expert in cycling demonstrates the ABC’s of bike gear.

activities.name: The ABC’s of Bike Gear
activities.description: Cub Scouts and adult partners will learn about the ABC’s of bike gear using an example bike.

activities.name: The ABC’s of My Bike
activities.description: Using their own bike or one borrowed, Cub Scout and adult partners learn the ABC’s of bike gear.

requirements.text: With your den or Tiger adult partner, learn about the safety gear you should use while riding a bicycle.

activities.name: Ask the Pro
activities.description: A guest speaker who is an expert in cycling demonstrates the ABC’s of bike safety gear.

activities.name: Check My Bike Gear
activities.description: Cub Scouts check their own safety gear.

requirements.text: With your den or Tiger adult partner, learn the safety rules to follow when riding a  bicycle.

activities.name: Chalk It Up Bike Rodeo
activities.description: Create a bike safety course using chalk patterns on the ground.

activities.name: When to Walk and When to Ride
activities.description: Review safety rules for bike riding.

requirements.text: With your den or Tiger adult partner, demonstrate proper hand signals.

activities.name: Simon Says – Turn Left, Turn Right
activities.description: Play Simon Says using the bike hand signals for turning left and turning right.

requirements.text: With your Tiger adult partner or family, ride a bike or begin learning how to ride a bike.

activities.name: I Want To Ride My Bicycle!
activities.description: Take a bike ride with your den.
